department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Request for information on Indigenous and non-Indigenous capacity for advertising services.
description: Canada is seeking information on the Indigenous and non- Indigenous capacity for advertising services of the GC Advertising campaigns. Specifically, creative production and or media planning services are sought for the campaigns. Bids, including all supporting documentation, can be submitted by  December 21st, 2023, at  14:00 EST. Bids received later will be nullified.
full_summary:
# Indigenous and Non-Indigenous Capacity for Advertising Services
## Tender Reference
WS4337790628-Doc4337855236

### Tender Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking information on Indigenous and non-Indigenous capacity for advertising services. This request pertains to creative production and/or media planning services for Government of Canada (GC) Advertising campaigns.

## Tender Details
- **Tender Closing Date**: 21 December 2023, 14:00 EST
- **Publication Date**: 04 December 2023
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 15 January 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: No specified end date
- **Tender Status**: Expired
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Procurement Category**: SRV
- **Notice Type**: Request for Information

## Additional Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User Entities**: Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC) and Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Regions of Opportunity**: None
- **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
- **Trade Agreements**: None

## Contact Information
- **Contact Name**: Pamela Gaglione
- **Contact Email**: pamela.gaglione@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18181994?extsite=MTgxODE5OTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

You can find the tender announcement at the above URL on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys websites. For more information about this tender, please contact Pamela Gaglione.
